languages.text: "Друкари-крыланы. Генетически измененные стервятники с нарощенными крыльями. Они сопровождают рейдерские корабли и первыми бьют по врагу. В Комморре эти твари сбиваются в стаи, чтобы не пасть жертвой более могущественных собратьев".

traits.locale_text: "Крылатые друкари. Генетически измененные воины с нарощенными крыльями, что летят вперед рейдерских кораблей и наносят первые удары по ничего не подозревающим жертвам. В Комморре эти твари сбиваются в стаи, чтобы не пасть жертвой более могущественных собратьев, ведь в иерархии Темного города у них нет своего места".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Winged Drukhari who have chosen to go through an agonising process to become such a monstrosity. They escort raiding ships and inflict the first strike on the enemy. In Commorragh, these creatures huddle in flocks so that they do not fall victim to the more formidable of their kin."
languages.original_text: "Друкари-крыланы. Генетически измененные стервятники с нарощенными крыльями. Они сопровождают рейдерские корабли и первыми бьют по врагу. В Комморре эти твари сбиваются в стаи, чтобы не пасть жертвой более могущественных собратьев".

traits.locale_text: "Winged Drukhari. Genetically altered scavengers with wings grafted onto their bodies. They escort raiding ships and inflict the first strike on the enemy. In Commorragh, these creatures huddle in flocks so that they do not fall victim to the more formidable of their kin."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Winged Drukhari who have chosen to go through an agonising process to become such a monstrosity. They escort raiding ships and inflict the first strike on the enemy. In Commorragh, these creatures huddle in flocks so that they do not fall victim to the more formidable of their kin."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Drukhari alados que han atravesado un proceso agonizante para convertirse en semejantes monstruosidades. Escoltan las naves de incursión y lanzan el primer ataque contra nuestros enemigos. En Commorragh, esas criaturas forman bandadas para evitar ser víctimas de sus parientes más formidables».
languages.original_text: "Winged Drukhari who have chosen to go through an agonising process to become such a monstrosity. They escort raiding ships and inflict the first strike on the enemy. In Commorragh, these creatures huddle in flocks so that they do not fall victim to the more formidable of their kin."

traits.locale_text: «Drukhari alados que han atravesado un proceso agonizante para convertirse en semejantes monstruosidades. Escoltan las naves de incursión y lanzan el primer ataque contra nuestros enemigos. En Commorragh, esas criaturas forman bandadas para evitar ser víctimas de sus parientes más formidables».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “那些长着翅膀的黑暗灵族自愿接受了痛苦的改造过程，变成了那样的怪物。他们负责护送突袭舰，对敌人打响第一枪。在科摩罗，这种怪物会成群结队行动，以免死在更加可怕的同类手上。”
languages.original_text: "Winged Drukhari who have chosen to go through an agonising process to become such a monstrosity. They escort raiding ships and inflict the first strike on the enemy. In Commorragh, these creatures huddle in flocks so that they do not fall victim to the more formidable of their kin."

traits.locale_text: “那些长着翅膀的黑暗灵族自愿接受了痛苦的改造过程，变成了那样的怪物。他们负责护送突袭舰，对敌人打响第一枪。在科摩罗，这种怪物会成群结队行动，以免死在更加可怕的同类手上。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「あんな姿になるために苦痛を受けることを選んだ、翼の生えたデュカーリだ。あいつらは襲撃船を護衛し、敵に先制攻撃する。コモラフでは、ああいう生物がさらに強力な同族にやられぬよう、群れを成しているのさ」
languages.original_text: "Winged Drukhari who have chosen to go through an agonising process to become such a monstrosity. They escort raiding ships and inflict the first strike on the enemy. In Commorragh, these creatures huddle in flocks so that they do not fall victim to the more formidable of their kin."

traits.locale_text: 「あんな姿になるために苦痛を受けることを選んだ、翼の生えたデュカーリだ。あいつらは襲撃船を護衛し、敵に先制攻撃する。コモラフでは、ああいう生物がさらに強力な同族にやられぬよう、群れを成しているのさ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Ce sont des Drukharis ailés qui se sont volontairement soumis à un protocole atrocement douloureux afin de se changer en monstres. Ils escortent nos croiseurs lors des raids et ce sont eux qui donnent le coup d'envoi des hostilités. À Commorragh, ces créatures vivent en groupes pour éviter de devenir la proie de leurs plus puissants congénères. »
languages.original_text: "Winged Drukhari who have chosen to go through an agonising process to become such a monstrosity. They escort raiding ships and inflict the first strike on the enemy. In Commorragh, these creatures huddle in flocks so that they do not fall victim to the more formidable of their kin."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont des Drukharis ailés qui se sont volontairement soumis à un protocole atrocement douloureux afin de se changer en monstres. Ils escortent nos croiseurs lors des raids et ce sont eux qui donnent le coup d'envoi des hostilités. À Commorragh, ces créatures vivent en groupes pour éviter de devenir la proie de leurs plus puissants congénères. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Geflügelte Drukhari, die entschieden haben, einen qualvollen Prozess zu durchlaufen, um zu einem solchen Monster zu werden. Sie eskortieren Angriffsschiffe und fügen dem Feind den ersten Schlag zu. In Commorragh rotten sich diese Kreaturen zu Schwärmen zusammen, damit sie ihren stärkeren Verwandten nicht zum Opfer fallen."
languages.original_text: "Winged Drukhari who have chosen to go through an agonising process to become such a monstrosity. They escort raiding ships and inflict the first strike on the enemy. In Commorragh, these creatures huddle in flocks so that they do not fall victim to the more formidable of their kin."

Sie eskortieren Angriffsschiffe und fügen dem Feind den ersten Schlag zu. In Commorragh rotten sich diese Kreaturen zu Schwärmen zusammen, damit sie ihren stärkeren Verwandten nicht zum Opfer fallen."

In Commorragh, these creatures huddle in flocks so that they do not fall victim to the more formidable of their kin."

languages.text: "Öylesi birer canavara dönüşmek uğruna tarifsiz acılara katlanan kanatlı Drukhariler. Baskın gemilerine eşlik edip düşmana ilk darbeyi vururlar. Bu yaratıklar, Commorragh'daki daha güçlü soydaşlarına av olmamak adına sürü hâlinde dolaşır."
languages.original_text: "Winged Drukhari who have chosen to go through an agonising process to become such a monstrosity. They escort raiding ships and inflict the first strike on the enemy. In Commorragh, these creatures huddle in flocks so that they do not fall victim to the more formidable of their kin."

traits.locale_text: "Kanatlı Drukhariler, öylesi birer canavara dönüşmek uğruna tarifsiz acılara katlanır. Baskın gemilerine eşlik edip düşmana ilk darbeyi vururlar. Bu yaratıklar, Commorragh'daki daha güçlü soydaşlarına av olmamak adına sürü hâlinde dolaşır."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
